name: PartialMusicProperty
desc: A partially type-erased identifier for a music item property from a concrete root type to any resulting value type.

items.name: static let albums: MusicRelationshipProperty<Artist, Album>
items.desc: An identifier for the relationship property that returns the associated albums for the artist.

items.name: static let albums: MusicRelationshipProperty<Song, Album>
items.desc: An identifier for the relationship property that returns the associated albums for the song.

items.name: static let albums: MusicRelationshipProperty<MusicVideo, Album>
items.desc: An identifier of the relationship property that returns the associated albums for the music video.

items.name: static let appearsOn: MusicRelationshipProperty<Album, Playlist>
items.desc: An identifier for the association property that returns a collection of playlists that include tracks from the album.

items.name: static let appearsOnAlbums: MusicRelationshipProperty<Artist, Album>
items.desc: An identifier for the association property that returns a collection of albums from other artists that this artist appears on.

items.name: static var artistURL: MusicExtendedAttributeProperty<MusicVideo, URL>
items.desc: An identifier for the extended attribute property that returns the artist’s URL.

items.name: static var artistURL: MusicExtendedAttributeProperty<Song, URL>
items.desc: An identifier for the extended attribute property that returns the artist’s URL.

items.name: static var artistURL: MusicExtendedAttributeProperty<Album, URL>
items.desc: An identifier for the extended attribute property that returns the artist’s URL.

items.name: static let artists: MusicRelationshipProperty<Album, Artist>
items.desc: An identifier for the relationship property that returns the associated artists for the album.

items.name: static let artists: MusicRelationshipProperty<Song, Artist>
items.desc: An identifier for the relationship property that returns the associated artists for the song.

items.name: static let artists: MusicRelationshipProperty<MusicVideo, Artist>
items.desc: An identifier of the relationship property that returns the associated artists for the music video.

items.name: static let compilationAlbums: MusicRelationshipProperty<Artist, Album>
items.desc: An identifier for the association property that returns a collection of compilation albums that include tracks by the artist.

items.name: static let composers: MusicRelationshipProperty<Song, Artist>
items.desc: An identifier for the relationship property that returns the song’s composers.

items.name: static let featuredAlbums: MusicRelationshipProperty<Artist, Album>
items.desc: An identifier for the association property that returns a collection of featured albums for the artist.

items.name: static let featuredArtists: MusicRelationshipProperty<Playlist, Artist>
items.desc: An identifier for the association property that returns a collection of featured artists for this playlist.

items.name: static let featuredPlaylists: MusicRelationshipProperty<Artist, Playlist>
items.desc: An identifier for the association property that returns a collection of the artist’s playlists.

items.name: static let fullAlbums: MusicRelationshipProperty<Artist, Album>
items.desc: An identifier for the association property that returns a collection of the artist’s full-release albums.

items.name: static let genres: MusicRelationshipProperty<MusicVideo, Genre>
items.desc: An identifier of the relationship property that returns the associated genres for the music video.

items.name: static let genres: MusicRelationshipProperty<Artist, Genre>
items.desc: An identifier for the relationship property that returns the associated genres for the artist.

items.name: static let genres: MusicRelationshipProperty<Song, Genre>
items.desc: An identifier for the relationship property that returns the associated genres for the song.

items.name: static let genres: MusicRelationshipProperty<Album, Genre>
items.desc: An identifier for the relationship property that returns the genres for the album.

items.name: static let latestRelease: MusicRelationshipProperty<Artist, Album>
items.desc: An identifier for the association property that returns the artist’s most recent album.

items.name: static let liveAlbums: MusicRelationshipProperty<Artist, Album>
items.desc: An identifier for the association property that returns a collection of the artist’s live albums.

items.name: static let moreByArtist: MusicRelationshipProperty<MusicVideo, MusicVideo>
items.desc: An identifier of the association property that returns a collection of additional music videos by the artist.

items.name: static let moreByCurator: MusicRelationshipProperty<Playlist, Playlist>
items.desc: An identifier for the association property that returns a collection of additional playlists by the same curator.

items.name: static let moreInGenre: MusicRelationshipProperty<MusicVideo, MusicVideo>
items.desc: A identifier of the association property that returns a collection of music videos in the same genre as this music video.

items.name: static let musicVideos: MusicRelationshipProperty<Artist, MusicVideo>
items.desc: An identifier for the relationship property that returns the associated music videos for the artist.

items.name: static let musicVideos: MusicRelationshipProperty<Song, MusicVideo>
items.desc: An identifier for the relationship property that returns the song’s associated music videos.

items.name: static let otherVersions: MusicRelationshipProperty<Album, Album>
items.desc: An identifier for the association property that returns a collection of other versions of the album.

items.name: static let playlists: MusicRelationshipProperty<Artist, Playlist>
items.desc: An identifier for the relationship property that returns the associated playlists for the artist.

items.name: static let playlists: MusicRelationshipProperty<Curator, Playlist>
items.desc: An identifier for the relationship property that returns the associated playlists for the curator.

items.name: static let playlists: MusicRelationshipProperty<RadioShow, Playlist>
items.desc: An identifier for the relationship property that returns the associated playlists for the radio show.

items.name: static let recordLabels: MusicRelationshipProperty<Album, RecordLabel>
items.desc: An identifier for the relationship property that returns the record labels for the album.

items.name: static let relatedAlbums: MusicRelationshipProperty<Album, Album>
items.desc: An identifier for the association property that returns a collection of related albums.

items.name: static let relatedVideos: MusicRelationshipProperty<Album, MusicVideo>
items.desc: An identifier for the association property that returns a collection of related music videos for the album.

items.name: static let similarArtists: MusicRelationshipProperty<Artist, Artist>
items.desc: An identifier for the association property that returns a collection of artists similar to this artist.

items.name: static let singles: MusicRelationshipProperty<Artist, Album>
items.desc: An identifier of the association property that returns a collection of the artist’s albums in the singles category.

items.name: static let songs: MusicRelationshipProperty<MusicVideo, Song>
items.desc: An identifier of the relationship property that returns the associated songs for the music video.

items.name: static let station: MusicRelationshipProperty<Song, Station>
items.desc: An identifier for the relationship property that returns the associated station for the song.

items.name: static let station: MusicRelationshipProperty<Artist, Station>
items.desc: An identifier for the relationship property that returns the associated station for the artist.

items.name: static let topMusicVideos: MusicRelationshipProperty<Artist, MusicVideo>
items.desc: An identifier for the association property that returns a collection of the artist’s top music videos.

items.name: static let topSongs: MusicRelationshipProperty<Artist, Song>
items.desc: An identifier for the association property that returns a collection of the artist’s top songs.

items.name: static let tracks: MusicRelationshipProperty<Playlist, Track>
items.desc: An identifier for the relationship property that returns the tracks in the playlist.

items.name: static let tracks: MusicRelationshipProperty<Album, Track>
items.desc: An identifier for the relationship property that returns the tracks on the album.
